| History                 = Habitat for Humanity is a non-governmental organization dedicated to the housing of everyone on [[Earth]].

Habitat for Humanity (as well as college campuses, [[Greenpeace (Earth-616)|Greenpeace]] or the [[Peace Corps (Earth-616)|Peace Corps]]) was also a recruitment source for [[Hydra (Earth-616)|Hydra]] in their rebuilding following the [[Skrull Empire|Skrulls]]' [[Secret Invasion]] and the consequent loss of 15,000 agents and the [[Ichor (Hydra Base)|Ichor base]] by [[Wolfgang von Strucker (Earth-616)|Strucker]] in order to root off the infiltration. Hydra's indoctrination techniques, seemingly more efficient on applicants with a "do-gooder mentality", with a retention rate of ninety percent among the individuals approached among Habitat for Humanity.{{r|Secret Warriors #2}}

The [[Inhomo supremis|Inhuman]]-descent woman who would be known as [[Mother Bones (Earth-616)|Mother Bones]] used to volunteer for Habitat for Humanity, until the [[Terrigen Cloud]] revealed her lineage.{{r|Inhuman #3}}
